Caleb Michael McGennis

Entrepreneur, Developer & Ministry Leader

Also known as: dr4g0nbyt3

Facebook

About Caleb

Caleb Michael McGennis is a visionary entrepreneur and dedicated ministry leader based in Jefferson City, Missouri. Known online as dr4g0nbyt3, Caleb has built a reputation for innovation, community service, and business excellence in Central Missouri.

As the founder and driving force behind multiple successful ventures, Caleb combines technical expertise with entrepreneurial spirit to create value across various industries. His businesses include BXP, The Honey Homestead, What's the Process for, Toxic Tournaments, Nostalgia Nuke, and LoHP.

Beyond business, Caleb is deeply committed to his faith and community. He serves as an active member of Sports Crusaders ministry, where he combines his passion for sports and faith to make a positive impact. His professional ministry experience includes 5 years with the Missouri Baptist Convention and 1 year at Concord Baptist Church.

Caleb Michael McGennis - Jefferson City Entrepreneur

Caleb Michael McGennis, also known by his online persona dr4g0nbyt3, is a prominent entrepreneur and ministry leader based in Jefferson City, Missouri. As the founder of BXP, The Honey Homestead, What's the Process for, Toxic Tournaments, Nostalgia Nuke, and LoHP, Caleb has established himself as a versatile business owner in Central Missouri.

His ministry work includes active involvement with Sports Crusaders, 5 years of service with the Missouri Baptist Convention, and work at Concord Baptist Church in Jefferson City. Caleb is married to Stephanie Kay McGennis and father to Leonardo Bryton McGennis and Raphael Corwyn McGennis.

Keywords: Caleb McGennis, dr4g0nbyt3, Jefferson City entrepreneur, BXP Missouri, The Honey Homestead, Sports Crusaders Jefferson City, Missouri Baptist Convention, Concord Baptist Church, Jefferson City business owner, Missouri entrepreneur, McGennis family
